title: Srimad Bhagavatam - Canto 1 Chapter 1 | Kids Quiz (10Q)

questions.prompt: Who are the sages gathered in Naimisaranya?
questions.feedback: The sages are wise teachers who want to learn about spiritual truth.

questions.prompt: Who is speaking to the sages in Chapter 1?
questions.feedback: Suta Gosvami speaks to the sages and answers their questions.

questions.prompt: What do the sages want to hear about?
questions.feedback: The sages want to hear about the Supreme Lord and spiritual topics.

questions.prompt: Why are the sages eager to hear spiritual topics?
choices: Because they bring happiness to the heart
Because they lead to material success
questions.feedback: Hearing about the Lord brings joy and peace to the heart.

questions.prompt: What is special about the Srimad Bhagavatam?
choices: It is filled with stories of devotion
questions.feedback: The Bhagavatam teaches devotion and love for the Lord.

questions.prompt: Who spoke the Srimad Bhagavatam originally?
questions.feedback: Sukadeva Gosvami first spoke the Bhagavatam to King Pariksit.

questions.prompt: Why is hearing the Bhagavatam important?
questions.feedback: Hearing the Bhagavatam helps clean the heart and mind.

questions.prompt: How should one listen to the Bhagavatam?
questions.feedback: Listening with respect helps us understand and grow.

questions.prompt: What kind of knowledge does the Bhagavatam give?
questions.feedback: The Bhagavatam teaches spiritual knowledge about the soul and God.

questions.prompt: What feeling should hearing the Bhagavatam create?
questions.feedback: Hearing the Bhagavatam helps grow love for the Lord.
